name: Emergency Services
description: The emergency department is licensed as a Basic Emergency Medical Service and run by a team of board-certified physicians certified in emergency medicine and highly qualified nurses. The team is committed to providing high quality emergency care within a reasonable time. The triage nurses will triage patients according to their conditions and situations in order to ensure they receive professional and appropriate treatment. Consultation, treatment and observation rooms are available when in need

howToGetIt: 24-7 access 415-677-2300 845 Jackson St, Floor B1, San Francisco, CA 94133 Open 24 hours
